title: Project Hoodie
body: When will my sweater arrive? It's past October and I haven't heard of any updates.

replies.body: I believe that players who pre-ordered recently received an email about delays, and that shipment is aimed for sometime this month.  I recommend hitting us up in [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need more context from the merch team, or unable to locate that email.  We'll respond as soon as we can.
